data.title: Who is Wrexham star Paul Mullin and what's his salary?
data.meta_description: PAUL Mullin is a goal-scoring machine for Wrexham, netting 38 goals during the 2022/23 season for the club.But who is he and how much is he earning?Wh
data.text:
PAUL Mullin is a goal-scoring machine for Wrexham, netting 38 goals during the 2022/23 season for the club.

But who is he and how much is he earning?

Who is Wrexham star Paul Mullin?

Paul Mullin is an English professional footballer, who plays as a forward in the League Two team Wrexham.

He was born on November 6, 1994, in Litherland, England.

Mullin started his career in the football academic training programs of Liverpool and Everton.

In 2012 he moved to Huddersfield Town and signed with the club.

He made his professional debut on August 12, 2014 for Morecambe.

During his time at Morecambe he scored 25 goals in 122 appearances, before he moved to Swindon Town in 2017.

Mullin only stayed there for one year before he signed with Tranmere Rovers, playing with the team from 2018 to 2020.

In 2020 he was signed to Cambridge, however on July 23, 2021, Mullin announced his new deal with Wrexham.

On May 15, 2023, Wrexham extended Mullin's contract until the summer of 2026.

What is Paul Mullin's salary at Wrexham?

Mullin earns £4,500 per week, which makes an annual salary of £234,00.

The owners of the club, Canadian actor Ryan Reynolds and Amercian actor Rob McElhenney, announced that every player received a £250,000 bonus when Wrexham was promoted to League Two at the end of the 2022/2023 season.

Executive director Humphrey Ker said: “Rob and Ryan wanted to recognise the players’ confidence that they can reach this season’s play-offs and provide an added financial incentive to achieve this.

“There was no obligation to address this, but it felt like the right thing t do in order to support the existing playing squad who are all playing for their futures at the club.”

Is Paul Mullin married and does he have any children?

Mullin is married to Mollie O'Brien and their first son Albi was born in 2019.

On January 27, 2023, he shared the news that his son was diagnosed with autism.

He wrote on Twitter: "Last week my little boy was diagnosed with autism luckily I have great people around me to help.

"Albi being Autistic doesn’t mean nothing he’s a happy and healthy boy no different to anyone else!

"Just a few hurdles in his way that am sure he will clear!"
